named-query.name: Produto.findAllByParameters
named-query.query: select o from Produto o where (:id is NULL or o.id = :id) and (:nome is NULL or upper(o.nome) like :nome) and (:empresa is NULL or o.empresa = :empresa) ORDER BY o.nome

named-query.name: Produto.findQuantityAllByParameters
named-query.query: select count(o.id) from Produto o where (:id is NULL or o.id = :id) and (:nome is NULL or upper(o.nome) like :nome) and (:empresa is NULL or o.empresa = :empresa) ORDER BY o.nome

named-query.name: Produto.findAllByAvailable
named-query.query: select o from Produto o where (:disponivel is NULL or o.disponivel = :disponivel) and (:empresa is NULL or o.empresa = :empresa) ORDER BY o.nome
